task_name: Build Notion ATS Database for Complete Recruitment Tracking
context: for end-to-end candidate and recruitment pipeline management
description: Create comprehensive Notion-based Applicant Tracking System (ATS) database with candidate cards, status tracking, interview scheduling, and team collaboration features. Integrates with Typeform applications and n8n automation. Part of Week 2 implementation for complete recruitment system.
dependencies: Team members invited to Notion workspace
success_criteria: Notion database created with all required fields and views
Typeform integration working (applications auto-create candidate cards)
n8n workflow connects CV screening to Notion
Team access configured with appropriate permissions

steps.name: Create Notion database structure
outputs: Notion database created
All properties configured (text, select, multi-select, date, URL, files, relation, formula, rollup)
steps.success_criteria: Database created with all 35+ fields: Full Name, Email, Phone, LinkedIn, Resume (file), Position Applied, Application Date, Status, Stage, Score, Source, Location, Experience Years, Education, Skills, Languages, English Level, Availability, Salary Expectations, Interview Date, Interview Notes, Hiring Manager, HR Owner, Tags, Created Time, Last Updated, Next Action, Priority, Rating (1-5 stars)

steps.name: Configure status pipeline and automation
inputs: Status options: New Application, CV Screening, Phone Screen, Interview Scheduled, Interview Complete, Offer Stage, Hired, Rejected, Withdrawn
outputs: Status field as select property with color coding
Board view by Status (Kanban)
Automation: Status change triggers notification
steps.success_criteria: Candidates can be moved through pipeline stages with visual tracking

steps.name: Create database views for different use cases
inputs: View types needed: Board (by Status), Table (all candidates), Calendar (by Interview Date), Gallery (candidate cards), List (hiring manager view)
outputs: 5+ database views created:
1. Board View: Candidates by Status (Kanban)
2. Table View: All Candidates (sortable, filterable)
3. Calendar View: Interview Schedule
4. Gallery View: Candidate Cards with photos/profiles
5. List View: Active Candidates (Status ≠ Rejected/Hired)
6. High Priority View: Score >85 or Priority=High
7. By Position View: Grouped by Position Applied
steps.success_criteria: All views configured with appropriate filters, sorts, and display properties

steps.name: Design candidate card template
inputs: Template sections: Header (photo, name, contact), Summary, Experience, Education, Skills, Interview Notes, Timeline, Attachments
outputs: Candidate card template created
Auto-populated fields from database properties
Sections for notes, feedback, decision logs
steps.success_criteria: Template provides comprehensive candidate profile view, easy to navigate

steps.name: Set up Typeform for job applications
inputs: Application form fields: Full Name, Email, Phone, LinkedIn URL, Resume Upload, Position Applied, Cover Letter (optional), Availability, Salary Expectations, How did you hear about us?
outputs: Typeform application form created
Branded with company logo and colors
Thank you page with next steps
Typeform webhook URL for n8n integration
steps.success_criteria: Form is professional, mobile-friendly, collects all required data, webhook configured

steps.name: Build n8n integration: Typeform → Notion
inputs: Field mapping: Typeform fields → Notion properties
outputs: n8n workflow: Typeform Webhook → Parse Data → Create Notion Page → Send Confirmation Email
Field mapping configured
Error handling for failed submissions
steps.success_criteria: Test submission creates Notion candidate card with all data populated

steps.name: Connect CV screening workflow to Notion
inputs: Existing CV screening workflow (Gmail → Gemini → Google Sheets)
outputs: Enhanced workflow: Gmail → Gemini → Google Sheets + Notion
Candidate card auto-created in Notion after CV screening
Score and AI analysis populated in Notion properties
steps.success_criteria: CV screening automatically creates or updates Notion candidate card

steps.name: Configure team access and permissions
inputs: Team members: HR team (full access), Hiring managers (edit access), Interviewers (comment access)
outputs: Team members invited with appropriate permissions
Workspace organized with clear navigation
Quick start guide created for new users
steps.success_criteria: All team members can access database with correct permission levels

steps.name: Test end-to-end workflow
inputs: Test scenarios: 1) Typeform application, 2) Email CV submission, 3) Manual candidate entry
outputs: 3 test candidates processed through complete workflow
All data populated correctly in Notion
Status pipeline works smoothly
Team notifications working
steps.success_criteria: All 3 test scenarios successful, no data loss, automation functioning

steps.name: Create documentation and team training
outputs: User guide: How to use Notion ATS
Quick reference: Common tasks (add candidate, schedule interview, update status, etc.)

Team training session notes
steps.success_criteria: Documentation complete, team trained and comfortable using system

compliance_notes: GDPR compliance: Notion is GDPR-compliant, but ensure data processing agreement in place. Candidate consent required before storing data. Data retention: configure automatic archival/deletion after 90 days for rejected candidates. Maintain audit log of all data access and changes.

troubleshooting.issue: Typeform webhook not triggering n8n workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Verify webhook URL is correct, check n8n webhook node is active, test with Typeform webhook tester
Add delay between n8n actions (3-5 seconds), batch process applications, use Notion integration instead of API if available
Add deduplication logic in n8n: search Notion by email before creating, update existing if found

troubleshooting.issue: Resume file upload fails from Typeform
troubleshooting.solution: Use file URL from Typeform, upload to Google Drive first, then link in Notion (Notion file upload via API has limitations)
Check sharing settings, ensure workspace membership, verify page hierarchy (database must be in shared space)

optimization_tips: Use Notion relations to link candidates to job postings (separate Jobs database)
Create calculated fields: Days in current stage, Time to hire, Source effectiveness
Set up automated Slack notifications for high-priority candidates
Use Notion formulas for candidate scoring aggregation
Create hiring manager dashboard with filtered views of their open positions
Add interview feedback template linked to candidate cards
Use Notion buttons for common actions (send rejection email, schedule interview)

notion_database_fields_detailed.fields: Full Name (title), Email (email), Phone (phone), LinkedIn (URL), Resume (files), Photo (files)

Position Applied (select/relation), Application Date (date), Application Source (select: Typeform, Email, LinkedIn, Referral, Job Board), Application Method (select: Online Form, Email CV, Direct Contact)

Status (select: 9 options), Stage (select: Sourcing, Screening, Interviewing, Decision, Closed), Next Action (text), Next Action Date (date), Priority (select: High, Medium, Low), Rating (select: 1-5 stars)

Location (text), Experience Years (number), Education Degree (text), Education Field (text), University (text), Skills (multi-select), Languages (multi-select), English Level (select: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2, Native)
AI Score (number 0-100), AI Recommendation (select: Reject, Interview, Priority), AI Summary (text), Key Strengths (text)
Availability Start Date (date), Salary Expectations (text), Visa Status (select: EU Citizen, Work Permit, Requires Visa, Not Applicable), Willing to Relocate (checkbox)
Interview Date (date), Interview Time (text), Interview Type (select: Phone, Video, In-person, Technical Test), Interviewer (person), Interview Notes (text), Interview Feedback (text)
HR Owner (person), Hiring Manager (person), Recruiter (person), Assigned To (person), Tags (multi-select), Internal Notes (text)
Created Time (created time), Created By (created by), Last Edited Time (last edited time), Last Edited By (last edited by), Candidate ID (formula: auto-generated)
